resources.string: Success is not the key to happiness, on the contrary happiness is the key to success.
Say to our ideals and our determination that we have a great God.
Man will never feel alone as long as he is accompanied by his principles.
Remember free time before time is tight.
Nothing in this world is 100% perfect,everyone is just trying to minimize the risk.
There is no talent here,this is hard work,this is an obsession.
A great leader doesnt tell you what to do,he shows you how its done.
